data.title: Sir Piers Gaveston Earl of Cornwall
data.text:
Notes for Sir Piers Gaveston Earl of Cornwall

Possibly s. of Arnaud de Gavaston (d. May 1302).

He was was captured by Guy de Beauchamp, Earl of Warwick, taken to Warwick castle and executed outside that town at the hands of the earls of Lancaster, Hereford, and Arundel.

Armorial Blazon notes for Sir Piers Gaveston Earl of Cornwall

Azure, three eagles displayed Argent.

Blazon source notes for Sir Piers Gaveston Earl of Cornwall

Dictionary of British Arms, Medieval Ordinary, Vol 1, p. 166.

DNB Main notes for Sir Piers Gaveston Earl of Cornwall
